-- PROBLEM STATEMENT --
 If user input is greater than 0, print "Jason". Else,  print "Tea" 
-- SOLUTION --
 x = input("Enter input ")
 if (x > 0):
  print("Jason")
 else:
  print("Tea")

-- PROBLEM STATEMENT --
 If user input is less than 1, print "Larry". Else,  print "Cat" 
-- SOLUTION --
 x = input("Enter input ")
 if (x < 1):
  print("Larry")
 else:
  print("Cat")

-- PROBLEM STATEMENT --
 If user input is equal to 2, print "Coffee". Else,  print "Jason" 
-- SOLUTION --
 x = input("Enter input ")
 if (x == 2):
  print("Coffee")
 else:
  print("Jason")
